channel.title: Triphyllius on Eschenbach's De Poetis Christianis Sacris
channel.description: Recent content in Triphyllius on Eschenbach's De Poetis Christianis Sacris

item.title: II
item.description: SEC. 3. –– Et inter Graecos quidem Poëtas, qui sacras materias Christianos pertractarunt, primum invenio Triphyllium, Episcopum Cyprium, seculo post C. N. tertio clarum, Spiridionis Tremithuntis, Cypriorum Episcopi, discipulum, qui teste Suida, Spiridionis praeceptoris sui Vitam, atque Miracula Iambicis versibus conscriptuam dedit.
